name: Cruel World (itch) (CyberToasty)
description:
CRUEL WORLD 

Made the game and all visual assets in 3.35 hours ≈ using Construct 3 for the Trijam #131 with the theme Genetics.

Collect DNA to help the specimen evolve and allow him to survive on his planet. The specimen will try to kill you and become more dangerous at each evolution. The game goal is to get as much DNA as possible before dying. 

The specimen evolve until 36 DNA, after he remains the same. 

Controls :
WASD to move
Left click to dash
E to interract

Credits ;
I've done all of the assets except the sounds and music.

Music :
Kevin Mcleod - Ropocolypse 2
Ropocolypse 2 Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
